getRoles

public java.lang.String[] getRoles(java.lang.String usecaseId)
Returns the roles for a usecase. If no roles are defined for this usecase, an array of size 0 is returned.

Parameters:
usecaseId - The usecase ID.
Returns:
A role array.

A boolean value.
